page.title: 18C M Shops
page.content: C M relies heavily on the Tourist trade. There are several Cafe's and Gift Shops that are only open in the summer season. However, at the Seaside end of the village the following shops are open all the year:- A Bakery where bread and cakes are baked on the premises, three Grocers shops, two licensed to sell wines & spirits, a Fish and Chip restaurant, a Butchers, a Pharmaceutical Chemist and a Builder's Merchants. There are two Craft shops, one specialising in home made candles and the other in homespun wools. There is a Shoe shop with a Dry Cleaning agency, two Garages with shops selling clothing, fancy goods and gifts and a Newsagents. There is also a Bank, a Sub Post Office, and three Public Houses.
